author: donaldp
msg: Remove the initialize and dispose stages in the lifecycle of a task as they no longer are needed given task execution occurs in a single pass.

author: donaldp
msg: Parameters object already has an EMPTY_PARAMETRS in it now

author: donaldp
msg: No need for task to implement Initializable/Disposable stages because tasks are imediatly executed and there is no concept of multiple passes ala Ant1.x
